package.name: mouf/utils.i18n.fine.file-translator
package.description: Fine is a PHP internationalisation package. It will help you provide applications that support several languages. FINE means: Fine is not english :). Translation is performed using PHP mapping files, but you will have a nice graphical interface in the Mouf framework to write your own translated messages.

4.0.x-dev.name: mouf/utils.i18n.fine.file-translator
4.0.x-dev.description: Fine is a PHP internationalisation package. It will help you provide applications that support several languages. FINE means: Fine is not english :). Translation is performed using PHP mapping files, but you will have a nice graphical interface in the Mouf framework to write your own translated messages.

install.description: This installer will create a file translator added on the defaulTranslationService if is created and bind it on the LanguageDetection
